text: Too Much Johnson is a 1919 American silent comedy movie directed by Donald Crisp and is the second version of the 1894 play of the same name by William Gillette. It stars Bryant Washburn, Lois Wilson, Adele Farrington, Clarence Geldart, Monty Banks, Monte Blue, Gloria Hope and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It is a lost movie. ==Other websites== * * Category:1919 comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Donald Crisp Category:Movies based on plays Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Too Much Johnson (1919 movie)
